item.title: Joint Blood Drive Highlights Need For Pets And People To Donate Blood
item.description: The American Red Cross of Tennessee and BluePearl Pet Blood Bank are partnering for a blood drive to save lives of both people and pets.

item.title: Why We Need Double Literacy To Life In A Hybrid World
item.description: We need double literacy to thrive in a hybrid world. The future is too complex for either-or, artificial or natural intelligence perception planning.
